General.Name: Mirae Asset Venture Investment Co. Ltd
General.Description: Mirae Asset Venture Investment Co., Ltd. is a private equity and Venture Capital firm specializing in growth stage, Buyout, Incubation, Turnaround and seed/startup. It prefers to invest in Biotechnology, Real Estate, ICT, Financials, Game, semiconductors, eco-friendly foods, renewable energy, education, entertainment and leisure, advanced manufacturing and others. The firm was founded in 1999 and based in Seongnam-si, South Korea with additional offices in Europe, North America, South America, Asia and Australia.
General.Address: B1, Mirae Asset Venture Tower Building, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13494
